entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 28. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 35.
